basics.name: Bruna Evaldt Carlos
basics.label: QA Engineer at Chama
basics.summary: Having started out as a developer, I quickly found my passion in testing. Increasingly, I have been combining quality assurance with a scrum master role. A healthy balance of engineering and QA skills allow me to easily collaborate with developers. As the team hits their stride, I like to introduce and write test automation scripts to maintain a quality level

education.institution: José Cesar de Mesquita - Porto Alegre, Brazil

summary: Write test ideas for stories based on acceptance criteria
Kicked off API test automation with Cypress to replace our weekly manual regression testing
Using Postman and Swagger to quickly perform API tests
Manual testing Android app with Android Emulator
Using Android Studio logcat to debug Android app
Experimented with Appium for Android UI test
Code review and collaborate with developers in writing unit tests
Wrote a script in JavaScript to test a data migration
Wrote a performance test script with K6
Using SEQ for backend debugging
Using SQL Server databases, Azure Table Storage and Firebase on a daily bases Using and cofiguring Split.io for feature flagging
Creating and maintaining build and releases pipelines for automated tests in AzureDevOps
Participate in the refinements to help unfold unknown unknowns
Coach the team to make quality everyone’s responsibility
Onboard and train junior QA’s team members
Write tests steps for the stories
Automated the scenarios using Selenium
Migrated the automated tests from Selenium to Cypress and stated using it as our main test automation tool
Collaborate with the Product Owners to understand the client's needs and identify the acceptance criteria
As a ScrumMaster, I facilitate the process and coached the team to get into the performing stage by running many experiments
When we moved to Kanban, I became responsible for the process, helping the team to implement it and adapt to the new way of work
Write and maintain automated tests using Selenium Webdriver and C#, as well as Cypress in some cases (negative testing)
Perform manual tests of new functionality
Participate in refinement and three amigo's session, collaborating with PO and developers
Facilitate retrospective with team members locally and remotely
